name: Just Yer Average Fighting Game
description:
This is a game where you fight enemies in an arena and try to survive the most waves you can. Game modes in this game are:

Infinite Battles - You play for an infinite amount of time and try to survive while fighting the hardest you can

Level Editor - You can mess around and create stuff in the level editor

Two-Player Battle - Defeat your friends on one keyboard 

You can also do some secret cheat codes that are amazing, powerful, and contains the extreme power of memes.
